Title: Tinubu should see ADC as unintended blessing, says Ohanaeze
Summary: The Igbo apex group, Ohanaeze Ndigbo, said the emergence of the African Democratic Congress (ADC) should serve as a wake-up call for President Bola Ahmed Tinubu’s administration to address the persistent economic woes, escalating poverty, rampant hunger, the group said .

Title: Foundation supports mother of preterm twins with N5m
Summary: Foundation supports mother of preterm twins with N5m . Mrs. Fatimoh Akewushola was admitted to the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU) of the Kwara State . The Well Being Foundation Africa (WBFA) presented the money to cover her medical expenses .

Title: Nigerian Guild of Editors suspends editor for one year over breach of confidentiality

Title: Education is the greatest investment any nation can make — Peter Obi
Summary: Former Labour Party presidential candidate and leading figure in the emerging opposition coalition ahead of 2027, Mr. Peter Obi, reaffirmed that the most critical investment any nation can make is in education, not natural resources .

Title: Leave Labour Party alone, join your coalition — Abure tells Gov. Otti
Summary: Factional National Chairman of the Labour Party (LP), Julius Abure, has called on Abia State Governor, Dr. Alex Otti, to stop what he described as deceptive claims about his membership in the party . Abure urged him instead to publicly align with the political coalition he allegedly supports .
